timeline.message: remove registry as parameter and instead rely on shared registry
Fixed DefaultAuthFilter having Priority=5000 (by way of default value)
Fixed DefaultInitialUserRealm not removing initial 'Bearer' prefix
Added ActiveUsersFilter, counting the active users via Cache
Metrics reporting of QueryExecution is now done for the whole tree.
Fixed not cleaning up Grafana Gauge.
